ARABIC: وَلَن يَتَمَنَّوْهُ أَبَدًۢا بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ وَٱللَّهُ عَلِيمٌۢ بِٱلظَّٰلِمِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: But they will never ever long for it because of what they have done. Allah knows the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: But they will surely not wish for death because of what they had done in the past; and God knows the sinners well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Believe it that they will never wish for it, for (they are fully aware of the consequences of) what they have sent before them for the Hereafter. And Allah knows well the mentality of the transgressors.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: But they can never have a longing for death because of what they have done. God knows the unjust well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: And they will never long for it, because of the evil deeds they have done in the past; and Allah knows the unjust, very well.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But they will never long for it because of what their hands have sent before them (i.e. what they have done). And Allah is Aware of the Zalimin.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: And they will never invoke it on account of what their hands have sent before, and Allah knows the unjust.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: But they will never long for it, because of that their hands have forwarded; God knows the evildoers;
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: But they will never long for it, because of that which their own hands have sent before them. Allah is aware of evil-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: But they will never wish for death, because of what their own hands have sent on before them; God is fully aware of the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: And they will by no means ever wish for it, because of that which their hands have sent on before; and Allah is the Knower of the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: But they will not long for it ever because of what their hands have sent ahead, and Allah knows best the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But they will never seek for death, on account of the (sins) which their hands have sent on before them. and Allah is well-acquainted with the wrong-doers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But they will never long for it because of what their hands have sent before them (i.e. what they have done). And Allah is All-Aware of the Zalimun (polytheists and wrong-doers).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: But they will never long for it (death), because of what their hands forwarded; and Allah knows the harmdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: But they will never wish for it, because of what their hands have forwarded. God is aware of the evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: But they will never wish for it, ever, because of what their hands have put forth. And Allah is Knowing of the wrongdoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [2:95] But they will never long for it, because of that which their own hands have sent before them, as a result of their rejection of the Prophet (s), the consequence of their mendacity. God knows the evildoers, the disbelievers and He will requite them.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (But they will never long for it) they will never ask for death, (because of that which their own hands have sent before them) because of what they themselves have done in the religion of Judaism. (And Allah is Aware of evil-doers) i.e. the Jews.
